content: star beret sizing explanation by kyotayacrochet the two sizes shown have the same size head opening but the bigger size is one row bigger in the outer diameter i made mine to fit a 20 head disclaimer thank you for downloading my pattern please do not use my photos or written content as your own if you are selling your work from stitches used my patterns please do not use my photos as your own to display your work magic_ring linking back to my site or double_crochet-double_crochet social media account s is dcinc- double_crochet much appreciated when increase work 2 double selling your work to crochet into the same recognize me as the stitch designer do not not slip_stitch-slip_stitch display my patterns or single_crochet-single_crochet written content for public sk1st- skip 1 stitch use they are for your chain- chain personal use only a lot of sc3tog- single croche 3 work is put into writing stitches together editing and photographing back loops only - work the to publish these patterns stitches into the back loops please be respectful of the last row happy crafting materials used worsted weight yarn 5mm crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving ends smaller size row 7 slip_stitch to move starting stitch *4dc 2dcinc ch1 skip chain space 2dcinc 4dc row 1 magic_ring 20dc sc3tog* repeat 4 more slip_stitch to close 20 times until end of row slip_stitch to close 85 row 2 *1sc sk1st all in next stitch 3dc ch1 row 8 slip_stitch to move starting 3dc sk1st* repeat ** 4 stitch *5dc 2dcinc ch1 more times for a five skip chain space 2dcinc 5dc pointed star slip_stitch to close row 2 sc3tog* repeat 4 more 35 times until end of row slip_stitch to close 95 row 3 2ss to move starting stitch *1dc row 9 slip_stitch to move starting 1dcinc in chain space stitch *6dc 2dcinc ch1 1dc ch1 1dc 1dcinc skip chain space 2dcinc 6dc 1dc sc3tog* repeat 4 sc3tog* repeat 4 more more times until end of times until end of row slip_stitch row slip_stitch to close 45 to close 105 row 4 row 4 slip_stitch to move starting stitch *1dc 2dcinc ch1 change color for edge skip chain space 2dcinc 1dc detail sc3tog* repeat 4 more row 10 slip_stitch to move times until end of row slip_stitch starting stitch *7dc to close 55 2dcinc 1dc in chain space 2dcinc 7dc sc3tog* row 5 slip_stitch to move starting repeat 4 more times until stitch *2dc 2dcinc ch1 end of row slip_stitch to close skip chain space 2dcinc 2dc 120 sc3tog* repeat 4 more row 6 times until end of row slip_stitch to close 65 row 6 slip_stitch to move starting stitch *3dc 2dcinc ch1 skip chain space 2dcinc 3dc sc3tog* repeat 4 more times until end of row slip_stitch to close 75 row 10 row 11 back loops only change color 120sc both loops as row 14 *8dc sc3tog normal slip_stitch to close 9dc* repeat 4 more times until end of round slip_stitch
